items.title: Random App Idea Generator
items.description: An application that generates random app ideas based on selected categories or themes.
acceptance_criteria: User can select one or more categories from a predefined list
System generates at least one unique app idea per request
Generated idea includes a title and short description
non_functional: Available on both mobile and web platforms

notes: The user request was vague; assumed the need is for an app that generates app ideas. Categories and themes can be expanded later.
